div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1747 Mesopotamia or Babylonia, before 1900 Burial: 390-385 B.C. (Robinson) Contents: 23 AR. Found with AR and AE objects Athens: 6 tetradr. frag. Aegina: 1 st. frag. Samos: 1 tetradr. Lycia: 1 st. (Kuprilli); 1 st. (Thibo) Aspendus: 1 st. frag. Salamis: 1 st. (Euelthon over "Idalium"); st. frag. Aradus: 1 tetrob. Sidon: 1 half-shekel Tyre: 1 shekel Persia: 7 sigloi Disposition: London 23 â€ Robinson, Iraq 1950, pp. 44-51 illus. Schlumberger, L'argent grec, p. 7, no. 6
